DOC.brief_summary: To detect similarities and differences in the endometrium of fertile and infertile patients
DOC.brief_title: Histomorphometry Analysis in Fertile and Infertile Patients
DOC.detailed_description: morphometric and pathologyc analysis of the endometrium in fertile and infertile patients
DOC.criteria: 18 to 41 years old regular menses infertility over 12 months previous uterine surgery use of contraceptive pills or injections less than 3 months from the inclusion in the study
